resources.string: When creating an account you \n accept our Term and Conditions.
You can\'t find a tour near \n your location? Ask for it.

string-array.name: IntroTitle
string-array.item: Have fun while descovering the world

string-array.name: IntroDesc
string-array.item: Gincana is a game in the real wordl. You must explore an area and overcome different challenges that we have prepared on its emblamatic places
We will test all your skill and abilities to analyze your surroundings. Clear all the map and complete the challenges to get a big prize
Some challenges may seem to but information can be found anywhere. Don\'t be shy to ask the locals if you are lost, that will enhance your tour
For the app to run smooth we need to access your GPS and camera. None of youre information is shared without your expess premission.
Do not drive any kind of vehicle while playing. Always pay attention to your surroundings while playing.
